title: Brutal Fight for Kherson Still Looms Between Russia and Ukraine
description: Ukrainian officials have warned that Moscow could be trying to create the illusion of a pullback to draw Ukrainian forces into a trap.
dc:creator: Marc Santora, Ivan Nechepurenko and Michael Schwirtz
media:credit: Ivor Prickett for The New York Times
media:description: Ukrainian soldiers returning to a village to spend the night last week before heading to the front line in the Kherson region. Ukrainian officials have said they expect a brutal battle for the city of Kherson.
